div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimonono
die mensis Januarij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Johne leslie of Warderis ser John ruthirford knycht Johne of cullan Androw cullan Johannes colisone
Johne' of mar androw fif and' vdiris takismen of the fischeingis of the raik warnit and comperit tile ansuer'
for the wranguis' fischeingis at placis boundis and merchis vteuthe' the bondis of the raik quhar
throu thai lat and stoppis the fischeingis of the mydchingill pot and furdis eftir the tenour of the
bill of complaynt gevin In be Dauid steuart tharapone of the quhilk bill the tenour followez'
schir aldirman and bailyeis we takismen and tennentis of the wattiris of the midchingill pot and
furdis meuis and complenis to your mastirschippis apon' the mastiris and seruandis of the raik that
fischis apone' the sandbed' and vdir placis without thar boundis and merchis of the raik and stoppis
and lattis the fischeing to our gret dampnag and skaitht / quharfor we beseik your M
to caus the said fischeingis of sandbed and stellis nocht to be wsit in tymis tocum And to desist
tharfra that we haue na caus' in tymez' to cum to complene' And your ansuer' herapone' that we neid'
nocht to seik remeid' at our souerane lord the king and his lordis of consaile for reformacioun of the
samyn gif sa beis that ye wil nocht desist and wse the said fischeingis we mon' seik remeid' and
will complene apone' the samyn And your gudlie ansuer' herapone we be seik And in presens
of the said Dauid the said bill of complaynt beand' red and vndirstandin the said personis takismen
of the raik accusit for the wranguis' occupacione of the said fischeingis denyit all wrang
And' thareftir the said takismen askit the said matir to be put to the decisioun' of ane assis' And requirit the
prouost and bailyeis be wertew of thar office that thai mycht haue ane knavleg and determinacion'
of ane assis' tharapone And Johne of mar forspekar for the said takismen fand ane borgh' in the
handis of Willeam scrimgeout officiar' that the said actioun' aucht to pas to the decision' of ane assis' consi//
dering thai war accusit for the wranguis' fischeingis at the said placis at the instance of the said Dauid
and denyit And thareftir fand' ane vthir borgh' that his borght was of awaile in defalt recovn//
tering And' in continent the said actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' of thir personis that
is to say Alexander gray Williame portar malcum crag Duncan fif Androw stratone A

The said day comperit Dauid mar and Willeame Wormet befor gilbert menyheis
Prouost thomas Waus and Duncane colisone tua of the bailyeis of the said
burgh' schew and exponit how Dauid steuart thar nychtbour had gevin In ane
bill of complaynt one thar behalf and vdiris takismen of the vuire wattiris of
Dee apone the masteris takismen and seruandis of the Raik anent the fischeing
at the stellis and sandbed' / quharfor the said Dauid and Willeame protestit
solempnitlie that quhat the said Dauid steuart did in the persewt of that
mater suld' turne thame to na preiudice sen' thai war nocht participant
with him nor tuk na part with him and denyit the bill of complaynt gevin In
tharapone and ale persewit or danger mycht cum thareftir ony tyme tocum

The said day Johnne brabnire protestit that he suld' nocht ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be thomas meldrum vnto the tyme he war new warnit becaus
that day was assignit to him to ansuer' to the said borgh' quhilkis he was reddy
to do and na man' come and persewit him

The said day Johnne andersone offerit him redy tile ansuer to the borgh'
fundin one him be thomas leslie in the naim of mage quhit anent the re/
leving of hir half land' of the annuel et cetera becaus' the said thomas
nor nayne' vthir comperit nocht he protestit to be quyt of his challance
quhile he was new warnit

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
secundo die mensis Januarij Anno quosupra

The said day Dauid Kinor grantit that he had boucht fra margaret Kintor
the wif of alexander malisone ane barrell of salmond' for lv s' and had pait
hir the mony of the said salmond' to xxvij s' or xxviij s' at the maist to compt
and reking' and' offerit him atour that quhat that the said alexander mycht preif
vnpait of the said barrell that he was reddy to pay it

The said day Alexander gray younger offerit him Reddy and grantit
him to ansuer' to the borgh' fudnin one him be Johnne' arthour for the wranguis'
withhalding fra him of iij s' g' and viij g' one friday that nixt cummys

The said day the bailyeis tuysday the xxiij day of this Instant monetht to
thomas chamer to ansuer to the borght fundin one him be malcome crag for
the wranguis' withhalding fra him of his fraucht

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to thomas chamer
to ansuer to the borght fundin one him be alexander horne for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of ane barrell of ter And ordanit him to put his borgh'
in writ and gif It to the said thomas that he mycht be auisite tharwith

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys till alexander
Nory till ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Jok Watsone seruitour to the
Prouost for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of ij Inglis grottis quhilk
he drank in the taverne And a tre of a barrell price xvj d'

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to meg Ramsay till
ansuer peremptourlie to the borgh' fundin one hir be Jonhne nicholsone
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of a pair of schetis

The said day Johnne colisone forspekar for meg Ramsay askit the
copy of the borgh' fundin one the said meg be Johnne nicholsone and'
a day of law to ansueir' to the samyn protestand' solempnitlie that quhat
day that the balyeis assignit to hir vthir thane a day of law suld' turne
hir to na preiudice

head.add: Statut' for gude of the mercat and mercat spillaris

div.p:
The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest balyeis ande
Counsale for the commone weile of the toune and the landmene that
It salbe lesum tile ale personis havande wittal' to Sell to bring
thar' wittalis to the mercat dalie and tile oppyne thar sekis and sele
ale tyme of day thar wittalis Ande that nay persone by ony
wittale eftir thre houris eftir nowne vndir the pane of eschet
of the wittale and xl s' to be pait tile Sanct nicholes werk
vnforgevin

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoquarto
die mensis Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day gilbert menyeis Prouost complenit to thomas leslie and
thomas Waus tua of the bailyheis sittand' In jugment / that alexander hay burges
of the said burgh' thane present had gretlie strublit him / quhilk strublance
he wald' nocht suffir not vnderly for fyve hundretht markis besekand'
the said bailyeis for remed of law And in continent the said thomas lesly bailye
accusit the said alexander for the said strublance / quhilk wald' nocht ansuer nor
obey bot contempnandlie passit out of the said court and' of the tolbutht
And' androw nauchtie ane of the officiaris at command of the said balye passit
and warnit the said alexander to Returne and entir again to the said court
and ansuer for the said strublance / quhilk dissobeit the said Androw officiar'
he beand' requirit anys tuys' thris' and tuechit with his wande of office thareftir the said officiar' brek
his wand of office one the alexander quhilk was sufficientlie
previt be diuers' famous personis the greit aitht suorne ffor the quhilkis
the said alexander was in amerciament of the court for dissobeing of the said
officiar and' till amend' as law will and fober in tyme to cum And
that was gevin for dome be the moutht of Williame fynne dempstar
of the said court And thareftir the said alexander comprehendit and
broucht agane befor the said bailyeis In jugment accusit for the said strublance
wald' nocht obey nor ansuer for the said strublance And Willeame Scrimgeour
ane of the officiaris of the burgh' at command' of the said bailye chargit the
said alexander anys tuys' thris' tuechit to ansuer in our Souerane lordis name' and his
for the said offens and strublance bot quhilk wald' mak nain ansuer' bot contemnandly
dissobeit the said officiar in the execucioun' of his / quhilk brek his wand of
office one him / for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court for the said
dissobedience and till amend as law will and forbeir in tyme tocum And that
was gevin for dome And thareftir the said alexander comperit and entirit again
in the said court / was Instantlie requirit tile ansuer for the said strub
lance quhilk oppynlie and de contempnandlie ansuerit and said that he wald'
nocht obey to thame and thai wald' brek ane bunche of wandis one him
And thareftir the said Willeame scrimgeour officiar at command' of the
said bailye chargit the said alexander anys' tuys' thris' and tuechit him
with his wand' of office till ansuer for the said strublance and offens quhilk
wald' mak na ansuer nor obey to thame And the said Willeame brek his
wand' of office one the said alexander ffor the quhilk dissobeing of the
said offiiar the said alexander was in amerciament of the court and till amend'
as law will and forbeir in tyme tocum And that was gevin for dome be
the moutht of the said dempstar And in continent thareftir the said Alexander
complenit to the said bailyeis that the said gilbert hed strublit him strikin
him and drawin him be the hair / quhilkis the said gilbert denyit
offering him reddy till vnderlie the decisoun' of ane assis' And thareftir
with consent of baitht the said partijs the said actioun' was put to the decisioun'
of ane assis' of thir personis vnder writin that is to say Alexander gray Dauid
andirsone William colp Dauid kintor Johne of murray Duncan fif Androw stevinsone
James strathachin Dauid straloche Alexander Kintor alexander nory Johnne
of crag Willeame stile William rollan' Duncan craik Androw stratone William
Kintor and Dauid grig / quhilkis riplie auisit the greitht aitht suorne' the richtis
ressonis and allegacionis of baitht the said partijs heid' sene considerit and vndirstandin
fand' and deliuerit all in ane voice concordand' the said gilbert quyt of all strub
lance strikin and offens done to the said Alexanderis

The said day ser Johnne' ruthirfurd knicht and Alexander ruthirfurd'
his sone wasmaid' quyt be ane suorne assis' Alexander gray forspekar
for the strublance of Alexander hay

Curia Balliuorum bugi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjto die mensis
Januarij Anno quo supra

The said day the borgh' fundin be richerd' Wricht one Dauid andirsone
for the wranguis' withaldin fra him of xl s' et cetera and' for xxlviij s' of
expens' was fundin of nain availe be ane suorne assis' ser' Johnne
rutherfurd forspekar becaus' thar was na witnes producit befor the
saide assis'

The said day thomas chamer grantit him to pay to Alexander horne
ane dussayn of Stanys of lynt for ane barrel of ter

Eodem die Johannes meldrum fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Robertum hile
suum procuratorem legittimum ad petendum et recipiendum a magistro Dauid lowsone
xxtj s' monete sibi debito de receptis acquitandum agendum prosequendum
defendendum Ceteraque omnia et singula faciendum gerendum et excercendum
in premisse Promittens de rato et grato

The said day the bailyeis assignit mmonunday that nixt cummys to Dauid andirsone
to bring the obligacioun folowit and' persewit be James colisone and Duncan colison'
et cetera Anent the Sovme of iiijC franche crovnis or ellis to schew ane resonable
caus' quhy he suld nocht bring and' deliuer the said' obligacioun' to the said
personis

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eisudem vicesimo
nono die mensis Januarij Anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day the Bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Robert litster till
ansuer to the borght fundin one him be allane litster for the wranguis' intrometting
and away takin fra the said allane of ane Instrument quhilk was in his possession'
and xxvij Inglis grottis

The said day Robert litster was amerciament of the court for the occupacioun'
of craft he nocht beand' maid' freman for y be his avin toung grant for the
quhilkis he was in amerciament of the corut And henry andirsone come Souerte
be his hand' vphaldin to pleis' the denys of gild' for the said amerciament

The said day Williame portar come Souerte be his hand vphaldin to the
denys of gild' for the composicioun' of Richard litster for his fredome
to pay to the said denys xxtj s' to the said denys that is to say x s' at pasche
nixt tocum and vthir x s' at Witsonday nixt and immediat hereftir And'
the said Richerd' oblist him to freitht and releif the said William of the said
Souerte

The said day It is fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne' assis' thar deliuerance
giffin in writ / that Richerd' litster had takin ane hous' fra marioun' lindoris for v yeris be
his avin tong grant for xxxviij s' of maile in the yer And' ordanit
the sad Richerd' to mend' the skaitht that he had done to the said house quhilk skath
salbe considerit be four personis that knew quhat the said hous' is warkit
sen' the saide richerd' eft entirit tharwith And' that being considirit be the said personys
and estimet the said richerd' sall gif it that is considirit and maid be thame
to the reformacioun' of the said house / And that being done scho sall find' him
ane sufficient hous' for the Ischey of his termes of five yeris And he to pay
his maile tharfor as he tuk It

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne' of Cullane
forspekar that thomas chamer sall deliuer his fraucht of the Danskin rais' to
malcome crag factour for dericht skipper of the hulk of nosterdame incontinent
And' ordanit the said thomas with the laif of his followis merchandis of the rais'
to persew and follou the said malcum in the naim of the said skippar for ony thing
that thai had to say to him or follow him of for costis skathis expens' or vthirwais

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis februarij Anno quingentesimo octauo

The said day Allane litstar with Duncan colisone his forspekar And Inquirit
at Johnne Watsone and henry andersone his mawis gif thai had ony clame'
or chalang of ony gudis / mariag geir or ony vthir gudis promittis or condi
cioun' for the mariag of his douchteris or vthirwais Offerand' him reddy
to mak thaim pament and' to vnderlie the law befor the prouost and bailyeis
that Jug ordinar And' the said Johnne and henry allegeit thar comptis
was nocht reddy and askit ane day that thai micht awis' with the samyn And'
thareftir till ansuer to the said allane And' the said prouost and bailyeis
assignit this day xv dais to the said Johnne and henry to ansuer'
to the said allane in the premiss'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Nono die mensis februarij Anno
Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis assignit this day viij dais till androu cullane'
till ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne red perdoner for the releving and
frething of the said Johnne' of tua schillingis of annuell aucht of his land' quhilk
he Inhabitis eftir the tenour of his chartir

The said day marioun' ramsay tuk hir to preive one friday that nixt cummys that the
actioun' and' borgh' fundin one hir be Johnne' nicholsone for the wranguis' withhalding fra
him of a pair of schetis was at summyssioun' And falyeing that scho preif nocht hir said
allegeance the said day scho sall ansuer peremptourlie to the said Johnnez' borgh' fundin
apone the said mater

The said day Agnes chapman tuk hir to preif one friday that nixt cummys that scho had
done that scho suld' do to thomas menyeis anent ane half netht quhilkis scho boucht
fra him and' had plesit and content him tharfor

The said day the borgh' fundin be mathou branche alexander malisone and cristofir prat on'
malcum crag factour ad Intromettour with the gudis of Devich' skipper of the hvlk of nosterdam'
that he aucht to mak pament to thame of xij s' for euiry boll of ry awing to thaim be the
said skipper lik as is in the said math malcumis compt buk proportis was fundin
of awaile be ane suorne assis' androu cullan forspekar And' that the said malcum
sall mak pament to the saidez' personis within terme of lawe of xij s' for euiry boll
of Ry that thai want becaus' is was sufficientlie previt be the baxtaris that the said
ry gef samekile' in the tyme' for the quhilkis the said malcum was in amerciament of
the court fo rthe wranguis' withhalding of the said money fra the personis

The said day the borgh' fundin be Androw gordone merchandman on' Johnne of mar
tailyeour and Johnne glas' tailyeour for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of certane
blak gray contening xxj eln' price the elne xvj d' was fundin of nain awaile
as it was strikin be ane suorne assis' Richerd' Waus forspekar for the quhilkis
the said Androw was in amerciament of the court for the wranguis' strikin of the said
borgh' And' till amend' as law will and ordanit him mend' his borgh' and gif In again
gif he plesit

The said day the bailyheis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to Alexnader Do
naldsone baxter to ansuer to the borgh' fundin on' him be Dauid futhes that he aucht to ressaue fra him v barrellis of flour of the rest
of vij barrellis quhilk he had bought fra him and giffin a goddis penny tharapone
and had ressauit tua barrellis of the vij barrellis and and aucht to ressaue the todir v barrellis
as he that had boucht thaim and giffin his arlis tharapone

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die mensis
februarij Anno quo Supra

Eodem die Andreas litstar burgensis dicti burgi deuenit caucionerius gilberto
menyeis preposito thome Waus et thome Wode duobus balliuorum pro Agnete
sclugy Sorore Willelmi Slugy quod comoda et firme vnius Camere anterioris
et bothe eidem Willelmo hereditarie contingenti Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Richardi hile versus austrum et terram quondam Johannis
Steuarte versus boream sibi per litteras Supremi domini nostri Regis concessis et
traditi quousque prefatus Willelmus ad dictum burgum aduenerit Erunt et responsalia secundum tenorem dictorum litterarum et cetera per manus
sue dextere ostendem terras ac bona Et Johannes brabnire obligauit se
per manus sue dextere ostensionem terras ac bona suos heredes executores ac
bonorum suorum Intromissores ad releuandum et conseruandum prefatum Andream
litstar heredes suos executores et assignatos Indempnos de huismodi fideiussione

The said day robert litstar lauchfully warnit Callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer to
the borgh' fundin one him be alane litstar for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of
ane Instrument and xxvij Inglis grottis et cetera thar for the ballies chargit Johnne
cuk officiar to pas' and' tak ane stras' fra the said robert' and lat it
agane to borgh' gif It be askit And' warne him to comper this day
xv dais as secund day of proces' to ansuer to the said' borgh'

The saide day the balyeis accusit Androw Josse in futy for tribulance of Johne
mathesone his wif and hous' quhilkis he denyit et cetera Ande Inquerit gif he
was complanteous' or hed' ony thing to say to the saide Johne his wif
or ony of his houshalde quhilk denyit and saide he had' nay thing
to say to tham for him self et cetera Ande allegit he had' nocht ado for his wyf
et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus Wormet deuenit plegius legalis per manum terras et bona quod Andreas Josse
in futy erit Indempnis pro Johanne mathesone et cetera aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes mar'
deuenit plegius legalis per manum terras et bona quod dictus Andreas erit Indempnis pro prefato Johanne
aliter quam per viam Juris et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum suo plegios Indempnes de
huismodi fideiussione per manus terras et bona

The xv day of februar the yeir forsaid' Willeame blinseile comper' on' that ane
part And sandy moresone one that vthir part for thame and thar wiffis was bundin
and oblist be the fathis of thar bodijs to stand' and' abid' at certane personis chosin
betuix thame Anent contrauersijs and strublance betuix thame et cetera quhilkis personis
deliuerit in the premiss' and put the said partijs tile vnite and concord' And ordanit gif ony
of the said partijs offendit tile vthiris and beis conuikit tharof sal pay xl s' to Saint werk
vnforgevin To the quhilkis bath the said partijs was oblist and suorne' tile obserue and'
kep be the fathis of thar bodijs
